document.full_text: ubs wealth management americas recently hired 15 financial advisers overseeing $1.5 billion in client assets and generating more than $14 million in annual fees and commissions, according to a source familiar with the business.
document.title: ubs hires 15 advisers with $1.5 billion in assets
